nodes.text: Hoth Travel Advertisement was a title of an advertisement poster which sought to lure spacers to the dangerous world of Hoth. It was similar to the Mustafar Travel Advertisement.
The poster depicted three Bith tourists posing on the icy plains of Hoth. The aurebesh text read, "Hoth, The Frozen Beauty."

A Hoth Travel Advertisement is a decorative item in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies which players could obtain for a limited period of time from May 15, 2009 through June 15, 2009 in a Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game scenario.
